did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Derrotero y jornada a las misiones 1752-1754
did.abstract: Holograph record of travel to missions throughout northern Mexico, including those in Sinaloa, Chihuahua, Nayarit, and Sonora.

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Jesuit Visitador General de la Nueva Espana, 1769.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph record of travel to missions throughout northern Mexico, including those in Sinaloa, Chihuahua, Nayarit, and Sonora.

relatedmaterial.p: Photocopy from microfilm. Austin, Tx : University of Texas, Latin American Collection, W. B. Stephens Collection.
